It’s very simple! ğŸ˜† # Slide 1 foobar --- # Slide 2 foobar Marp for VS Code https://github.com/marp-team/marp-vscode https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=marp-team.marp-vscode Marp CLI https://github.com/marp-team/marp-cli Install npm install -g @marp-team/marp-cli Basic usage Convert to HTML marp slide-deck.mdormarp slide-deck.md -o output.html Convert to PDF (–pdf) marp --pdf slide-deck.md
